thread.title: Wonderful Anniversary stay at Gild Hall
thread.title_full: Wonderful Anniversary stay at Gild Hall - Review of Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Edwin S
title: Wonderful Anniversary stay at Gild Hall
text: From the minute we arrived at Gild Hall, we were made to feel extremely welcomed and the front desk people could not have been nicer. When they heard it was our anniversary, they upgraded us to a special room that was exquisite. They went out of their way to take care of all of our needs. We loved our stay and will definitely be returning again soon .
